msg: - Patch by Henri Gomez. Gracefully handles the case where the remote
web server closed the connection (which is a valid situation).

msg: Add DASL SEARCH method to Ajp13/14

author: marcsaeg
msg: POSTed data was not being sent to Tomcat using AJP13.  The request data was
being read into op->post, but being written from op->reply!  Basically, it
always sent an empty buffer as the posted data.

author: remm
msg: - Don't set a connection timeout by default.
